Installation

Note

It is recommended to install gwcosmo and gwsnr before installing ler. See the gwsnr documentation . You can install gwsnr with pip but gwcosmo needs custom Installation from the source for gwcosmo.

pip install ler gwsnr

This will install the dependencies needed but the version of gwsnr will not necessarily be the correct version for your system.

ler for development

To install ler for development purposes use github.ler.

git clone https://github.com/hemantaph/ler.git
cd ler
pip install . -e

Installation from the source for gwcosmo

git clone https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/gwcosmo.git
cd gwcosmo
pip install -r requirements.txt
pip install .
